title: 2.3 Master Challenge 1
question: Design a Python program to print all the prime numbers between 2 and a user-defined limit. Remember, a prime number is a number that has only two distinct positive divisors: 1 and itself.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
